title: Best of The Herd: 09/17/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 09/17/2018
description:
Colin explains why week 2 in the NFL was really a bad day for Le’Veon Bell. He thinks Packers fans are the last ones that should be complaining about the personal foul penalty Clay Mathews got for his hit on Kirk Cousins. Colin talks about where he was right and wrong over the weekend. Plus, former #1 pick David Carr stops by to discuss his brother Derek's relationship with Jon Gruden and why the Cowboys have to make sure Dak Prescott isn't asked to do too much. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
